name: Medieval Space Battle
description:
Medieval Space Battle

Controls: Arrow Keys.

This is my game for Kenney Jam 2019.

I had no time this weekend so this is an unfinished project. But is what I've done this afternoon.

The theme is: Unlikely combinations.

The idea is combine spaceships with medieval weapons like swords, axes and bows.

I'd like to make more things: different type of enemies with different abilities, shields, Power-ups, etc. but I haven’t had more time.

Hope you like it!
